nodes.text: Discord missiles were jet-powered missiles carried by droid tri-fighters, vulture droids, and droid gunships that contained up to seven Pistoeka sabotage droids. Once fired, they dodged their way through enemy defenses with maneuvering thrusters until they reached their target and hatched open, releasing a swarm of buzz droids that used their mechanical arms and cutting tools to dismantle enemy ships and droids and inflict as much damage as possible.

Discord missiles first appeared in the 2005 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. They were later first identified in the 2015 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, published by Dorling Kindersley.
